title: 現行法規所定貨幣單位折算新臺幣條例
title_en: Act Governing the Conversion of Currency Units Used in Existing Laws and Regulations into New Taiwan Dollars
short_name: Act Governing the Conversion of Currency Units Used in Existing Laws and Regulat
description: Official legislation text from Taiwan Laws & Regulations Database. Category: 行政＞金融監督管理委員會＞銀行目. Articles extracted: 3.

provisions.title: 第 1 條
provisions.content: 為現行法規所定貨幣單位折算為新臺幣，以維持現行法規之適用，特制定本條例。

provisions.title: 第 2 條
provisions.content: 現行法規所定金額之貨幣單位為圓、銀元或元者，以新臺幣元之三倍折算之。
